title: got banned for writing something sarcastic
body: i was playing kat and i was getting extremely fed then a yasuo took my quad (i wasnt angry ) but i started swearing at him in  a SARCASTIC  way and i guess he or someone else on our team  thought i was being super serious and reported me for being toxic. now im perma band please lift my ban i havnt spent money and time lots of it on this game :(
